metadata.title: CVE-2020-12272 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: OpenDMARC through 1.3.2 and 1.4.x allows attacks that inject authentication results to provide false information about the domain that originated an e-mail message. This is caused by incorrect parsing and interpretation of SPF/DKIM authentication results, as demonstrated by the example.net(.example.com substring.

criterions.comment: opendmarc package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
